pullrequest.title: mass.py Add support for: Selenocysteine 'U' and Pyrrolysine 'O'

content.raw:
Actually, my previous comment is incorrect. All isotopes are taken into account, and isotope information seems complete and accurate.
Still, the average mass as calculated by pyteomics is 168.05, while the Internet has 168.07.
content.html: Actually, my previous comment is incorrect. All isotopes are taken into account, and isotope information seems complete and accurate. Still, the average mass as calculated by pyteomics is 168.05, while the Internet has 168.07.
